title: Ticket #1620: StatInfo::OnlyStatIfDir() doesn't work as expected
description:
Calling StatInfo::OnlyStatIfDir() doesn't appear to have any effect. 

/** Only do lstat() if the path is a directory?
	@param true: don't lstat unless
	@return void
 */
void OnlyStatIfDir( bool only_stat_if_dir )
	{ m_onlyLstatIfDir = only_stat_if_dir; };

m_onlyLstatIfDir is only used within StatInfo::stat_file() which is only called via the StatInfo constructor. Either stat_file() needs to be called within OnlyStatIfDir() or the method needs to be removed. In my initial search the method doesn't appear to be called anywhere so I think that a removal is probably best.
check_ins: 2010-Sep-02 09:47   Check-in [18916]: Removed StatInfo::OnlyStatIfDir(). It didn't have any effect and wasn't being used anywhere. #1620 (By Josh Slauson )
